member.name: T:DynamicCalculator.DatabaseNotifier
member.summary: The DatabaseNotifier is an action adapter which takes multiple input measurements and defines a boolean expression such that when the expression is true a database operation is triggered.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DatabaseNotifier.ExpressionText
member.summary: Gets or sets the boolean expression used to determine if the database operation should be executed.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DatabaseNotifier.DatabaseConnnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection string used for database operation.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DatabaseNotifier.DatabaseProviderString
member.summary: Gets or sets the provider string used for database operation. Defaults to a SQL Server provider string.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DatabaseNotifier.DatabaseCommand
member.summary: Gets or sets the command used for database operation, e.g., a stored procedure name or SQL expression like "INSERT".

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DatabaseNotifier.DatabaseCommandParameters
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameters for the command that includes any desired value substitutions used for database operation. Available substitutions: {Acronym} and {Timestamp}.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DatabaseNotifier.DatabaseMaximumWriteInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum interval, in seconds, at which the adapter can execute database operations. Set to zero for no delay.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DatabaseNotifier.TimestampSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the source of the timestamps of the calculated values.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DatabaseNotifier.Status
member.summary: Returns the detailed status of the data input source.

member.name: M:DynamicCalculator.DatabaseNotifier.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes .

member.name: M:DynamicCalculator.DatabaseNotifier.HandleCalculatedValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Handler for the values calculated by the .

member.name: M:DynamicCalculator.DatabaseNotifier.QueueOperation
member.summary: Queues database operation for execution. Operation will execute immediately if not already running.

member.name: T:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier
member.summary: The EmailNotifier is an action adapter which takes multiple input measurements and defines a boolean expression such that when the expression is true an e-mail is triggered.

member.name: M:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the .

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.ExpressionText
member.summary: Gets or sets the textual representation of the boolean expression.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.From
member.summary: Gets or sets the e-mail address of the message sender.
member.exception: Value being assigned is a null or empty string.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.ToRecipients
member.summary: Gets or sets the comma-separated or semicolon-separated e-mail address list of the message recipients.
member.exception: Value being assigned is a null or empty string.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.CcRecipients
member.summary: Gets or sets the comma-separated or semicolon-separated e-mail address list of the message carbon copy (CC) recipients.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.BccRecipients
member.summary: Gets or sets the comma-separated or semicolon-separated e-mail address list of the message blank carbon copy (BCC) recipients.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.Subject
member.summary: Gets or sets the subject of the message.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.Body
member.summary: Gets or sets the body of the message.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.SmtpServer
member.summary: Gets or sets the name or IP address of the SMTP server to be used for sending the message.
member.exception: Value being assigned is a null or empty string.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.IsBodyHtml
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicating whether the message body is to be formatted as HTML.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.Username
member.summary: Gets or sets the username used to authenticate to the SMTP server.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.Password
member.summary: Gets or sets the password used to authenticate to the SMTP server.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.EnableSSL
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag that determines whether to use SSL when communicating with the SMTP server.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.TimestampSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the source of the timestamps of the calculated values.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.Status
member.summary: Returns the detailed status of the data input source.

member.name: M:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes .

member.summary: Handler for the values calculated by the .

member.name: T:DynamicCalculator.TimestampSource
member.summary: Represents the source of a timestamp.

member.name: F:DynamicCalculator.TimestampSource.Frame
member.summary: An incoming frame timestamp.

member.name: F:DynamicCalculator.TimestampSource.RealTime
member.summary: Real-time as defined by the concentration engine.

member.name: F:DynamicCalculator.TimestampSource.LocalClock
member.summary: The system's local clock.

member.name: T:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator
member.summary: The DynamicCalculator is an action adapter which takes multiple input measurements and performs a calculation on those measurements to generate its own calculated measurement.

member.name: F:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator.DefaultImports
member.summary: Defines the default value for property.

member.name: M:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the .

member.summary: Gets or sets output measurements that the action adapter will produce, if any.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator.ExpressionText
member.summary: Gets or sets the textual representation of the expression.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator.VariableList
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of variables used in the expression.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator.Imports
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of types which define methods to be imported into the expression parser.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator.SupportsTemporalProcessing
member.summary: Gets the flag indicating if this adapter supports temporal processing.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator.UseLatestValues
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag indicating whether to use the latest received values to fill in values missing from the current frame.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator.SentinelValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the value used when no other value can be determined for a variable.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator.CalculationInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval at which the adapter should calculate values.
member.remarks: Set to zero to disable the timer and calculate values upon receipt of input data.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator.TimestampSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the source of the timestamps of the calculated values.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator.InputMeasurementKeys
member.summary: Gets or sets primary keys of input measurements the dynamic calculator expects.

member.summary: Starts the or restarts it if it is already running.
